hackathon-description-text: Join 300 other talented students at the beautiful campus of Trent University for a truly memorable 37hr hackathon!

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Machine Learning Hack by ECHacks
Best Use of Project Management by ECHacks

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The most creative and well received hack with a focus in the betterment or interest of mental health will receive a Muse Brain Wave Sensing Headband for each member within the group.
Wild Rock Outfitters will reward a gift-basket to the team with the most innovative outdoors/adventure related hack
.Tech will award amazon gift-cards to the team with the best use of the .tech domain name

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Pitch Perfect by the Peterborough Innovation Cluster
Best Green Hack by TD Bank
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Every member of the top 15 teams will be awarded with a Wolfram Alpha prize packs
The team that has the best visualization of cash flow will receive a Bluetooth speaker

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Display of Accessibility by Big IDeA

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1600 W Bank Dr, Peterborough, ON K9J 0G2, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 1600 W Bank Dr, Peterborough, ON K9J 0G2, Canada
